Work stoppage data cover strikes and lockouts that amount to 10 or more person-days not worked.
This CANSIM table replaces archived table 278-0009.
This breakdown represents a combination of geographic location and jurisdiction.
This combines the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 41 and 44-45.
This combines the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 48 and 49.
This combines the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes 71, 72 and 81.
